what: Run GETS-based model selection using configuration settings. — select_model
title: Run GETS-based model selection using configuration settings. — select_model
text: Executes GETS workflow single equation, sourcing parameters `config.yml`. function can optionally accept preloaded data avoid disk reads returns key artefacts invisibly downstream use. set yvar_name, xvar_list parameters dataset contains extended history pseudo-forecast model equation saved text file ready copied plot compares new forecast pseudo-forecast

title: Run GETS-based model selection using configuration settings. — select_model
